topics.body:
HEY GUYS!

A guy from Know Your Meme found a page where you can turn any pic or photo into a 8-bit photo! Customize block settings and use preset palettes from classic video games.

"Here is the page. Enjoy!":http://superpixeltime.johnnylml.com/
